channel.title: Jmadness recruiting
channel.description:
[size=12pt][b]Jmadness server recruiting!!![/b][/size] I will keep this short and sweet.
Jmadness needs a Game designer - This person will create the design of the game. They [b]Will not code[/b] but will create pages of ideas for skills and game features. Also the game designer must create the xp rates and economy formulas. This job is not for noobs You must do your work and it must be professional. If the designs pass the lead developer It will be added to game.
Jmadness needs an artist - A person capable of making the required dat files for a few customs No more than 2-3 models will be needed so it is an easy job and the models will often be varients of the original models. [b]You will not need coding knowledge[/b] All models will be inspected by lead artist. Work must be [b]Original[/b]
Jmadness needs an advertiser - Someone who is proactive in making videos and server ads but this job will not start until server is upon release.
All work will be apart from server and sent in. But you must earn the Job The jobs will be decided by August 8th. The reason for that date I don't know ask Epidemik. You must pm me your Bio/Resume if you are doing 3d work. Otherwise you must Pm me with reason as to why you are good for the part and your seriousness to the job. Finally, you will recieve Premium access to server as well as a position in the server. You will not recieve admin/mod but you will recieve you position.(3d artist, Game designer, Advertiser) which will all have rights of an admin with the exception of advertiser which will be mod. These are not instantly given as you must earn through your work these positions.
The Jmadness team already contains 2 coders (Halolouis, Epidemik) and a lead Game designer (Yenrac) and a lead 3d artist (Username/Kesha)

item.title: Jmadness recruiting
item.dc:creator: @Caelan_P Caelan :P
item.description:
@Caelan_P wrote:

Sorry about me Not Posting back to you halouie. I attempted making a server again. Was more Succsessful but I Didnt know how to put it up Screw it. and Btw Its Caelan For some Strange Reason Doombolt & Caelan Have Been Hacked! You May think this is just a scam but im SERIOUS.
Please Answer ;(

I Can also Advertise by making a new youtube account and making a youtube video for it. You wouldn’t want me to upload a vid on my normal account =S. Got Ipod hacks & stuff its fun ;3
Name of new Youtube acc?: None

I Really hope U post Back coz I havnt seen you INAWHILE.
I have school so I wont be on that much FOR NOW.
Almost Holidays (^.^) Christmas Holidays!

Read full topic

item.title: Jmadness recruiting
item.dc:creator: @Cowarooroo Cowarooroo
item.description:
@Cowarooroo wrote:

[quote=“halolouis, post:1, topic:349244”][size=12pt]Jmadness server recruiting!!![/size]
I will keep this short and sweet.

Jmadness needs a Game designer - This person will create the design of the game. They
Will not code but will create pages of ideas for skills and game features. Also the
game designer must create the xp rates and economy formulas. This job is not for noobs
You must do your work and it must be professional. If the designs pass the lead developer
It will be added to game.

Jmadness needs an artist - A person capable of making the required dat files for a few customs
No more than 2-3 models will be needed so it is an easy job and the models will often be
varients of the original models. You will not need coding knowledge All models will be
inspected by lead artist. Work must be Original

Jmadness needs an advertiser - Someone who is proactive in making videos and server ads
but this job will not start until server is upon release.

All work will be apart from server and sent in. But you must earn the Job
The jobs will be decided by August 8th. The reason for that date I don’t know ask
Epidemik. You must pm me your Bio/Resume if you are doing 3d work. Otherwise you must
Pm me with reason as to why you are good for the part and your seriousness to the job.
Finally, you will recieve Premium access to server as well as a position in the server.
You will not recieve admin/mod but you will recieve you position.(3d artist, Game designer,
Advertiser) which will all have rights of an admin with the exception of
advertiser which will be mod. These are not instantly given as you must earn through your
work these positions.

The Jmadness team already contains 2 coders (Halolouis, Epidemik) and a lead Game designer
(Yenrac) and a lead 3d artist (Username/Kesha)[/quote]
I can make some models, Here’s an example of a sword I made.
